content.en: Adaptive video streaming: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms in video streaming platforms can adapt to changes in network conditions to provide a better user experience. They have developed various rate adaptation mechanisms and algorithms that optimize the quality of video streaming based on the available bandwidth. These algorithms aim to achieve smooth and high-quality bitrate adaptation, maximize user experience, and enhance the performance of adaptive bitrate algorithms in HTTP-based video streaming.
content.da: Adaptiv videostreaming: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer i videostreaming-platforme kan tilpasse sig ændringer i netværksforholdene for at give en bedre brugeroplevelse. De har udviklet forskellige mekanismer og algoritmer til hastighedstilpasning, der optimerer kvaliteten af videostreaming baseret på den tilgængelige båndbredde. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at opnå en jævn og høj kvalitet af bitrate-tilpasning, maksimere brugeroplevelsen og forbedre ydelsen af adaptiv bitrate-algoritmer i HTTP-baseret videostreaming.
